q: The wrong order of priority is like a rose.
In a honeyed turmoil, one is deprived of common sense.
Your greatest weakness is what you hold dear.
Behind a melancholic smile lies the art of pretending.
The modern world is a delusion.
Desire distances us from reason.
Does reason allow us to stay in control? Is it always right?
In this joy of obscure thought, I feel a tempered holy anger.
In the pain of social disappointment lies the solution for eternity.
Trust, is like an infant who needs care and affection.
The world is a capitalist lost in its own capitalism.
Whoever calls themselves master today without showing humility will become a beggar later.
A warrior does not focus on the difficulty of the battle but remains fixed on the goal: Victory.
Let the love for your partners never be an obstacle to a friendship.
Each day has its realities, but each reality holds its lessons.
The fragility of the body is a danger, but that of the mind is a poison to life.
Comfort misleads us, but a life of subsistence strengthens and helps us grow.
Life is a paradise of thorns and honey.
Between sensitivity and love, there is reality.
Beautiful she is, harsh she is, relentless she is, sometimes humiliating she is â€” yet no one wishes to lose her: Life.
A choice with meaning: the essence of a word or a gesture revitalizes our being.,
A light cannot prevail if it is not allowed!
Believing in the process is not enough you must also embrace it.
